suncertify.network
Class NetworkConnector

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.network.NetworkConnector

public class NetworkConnector
extends java.lang.Object

This class is static factory and is used by the client to get a connection to the remote database. This connection is made using a RMI network connection.

Version:
1.3
Author:
Pedro Oliveira
See Also:
DBRemote

Method Summary
static DBRemote getRemote(ConfigOptions options)
          This is the static factory method through each one can get access to the remote database object.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getRemote

public static DBRemote getRemote(ConfigOptions options)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This is the static factory method through each one can get access to the remote database object.

This method creates the RMI connection using the values specified in the options parameter.

Parameters:
options - the configuration options necessary to set the RMI connection.
Returns:
an instance of DBRemote.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection to the remote database was not possible.
